message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, but you get a decent share
I'll give you a slight edge, but still a fair deal!
You're getting desperate, I'll take most of the cake
I'll give you a decent chunk, but not the whole pie
You're running out of options, I'll take most of it now
I'll give you the majority, but I'm not going down without a fight
You're almost out of time, take the last crumbs
I'll take what's left, but I'm not going down without a fight
You're almost out of money, take the last penny
